This great Lawgiver formed a powerful City without any of the usual Means of Grandeur or Defence; without Arts, Commerce, Money, or Walls. He infused a Spirit of Ambition into the Hearts of its Inhabitants‚ without the Ideas of extending their Dominions; and inspired them with Courage, even to Enthufiasm, without indulging to the Ardours of Viemry in Pursuit of their Enemies.
